channel.title: [PI]Making the skip loop for basket of eggs
channel.description: I recently added a working code that makes my character skip when holding basket of eggs. I added the code into my WearItem.java. It skips for about 2 seconds then just stops, can somebody please tell me how to loop it so my character keeps skipping. Thanks.

item.title: [PI]Making the skip loop for basket of eggs
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

go to itemassistant or combatassistant, i dont remember off the top of my head. And add the stand animiation and a “while” statement.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Making the skip loop for basket of eggs
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:407475”]um try to add something like this.

c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.freezeTimer= 100000000;
btw could you pm me the anim code :D[/quote]I tried adding “c.freezeTimer= 100000000;” at the end of it cause I already had the other 2 in it. But it still doesn’t work :(. Any other ideas?

Read full topic
